channel.title: Deadbody13 on Mostly Harmless Cafe
channel.description: Recent content in Deadbody13 on Mostly Harmless Cafe

item.title: Lasagna
item.description: Ingredients 9 lasagna noodles 1 lb ground beef ½ lb ground pork subst: ¼ lb sausage 8 oz mushrooms (sliced) 1 small onion (diced) 1 tsp fennel seeds (ground) 6 oz can of tomato paste 28 oz can of crushed tomatoes 2 cloves of garlic (minced) 2 inch knob of ginger (minced) 15 oz ricotta 1 egg ¼ cup pecorino romano 8 oz mozzarella cheese not pre-shredded, cheaper is better, feel free to add more salt & pepper vegetable oil (for cooking meat) olive oil (for cooking sauce) Instructions Preheat oven to 375F Cook noodles per box instructions (don’t forget to salt water).

item.title: Blue Cheese Burger
item.description: Ingredients: 1 lb ground beef (20%+ fat) hamburger buns jalapeno (sliced, ⅛ inch) yellow onion (sliced as thin as you can) ⅓ cup of blue cheese crumbles if you’re using a solid block, cut off enough to stack on a burger about ¼ inch high blackened seasoning buffalo sauce of choice salt & pepper Instructions: On medium heat, toast the inner side of the buns with olive oil. About 2½-3 minutes is usually enough.

item.title: Beef Stroganoff
item.description: Ingredients: 1 lb wide egg noodles (dry) ¼ cup butter (divide into 2) 1½ lbs thin sliced chuck (~¼inch) salt & pepper 1 yellow onion (sliced) 1 lb bella mushrooms (sliced) 4 cloves garlic (minced) ½ cup white wine subst: ½ cup vegetable stock and 1 tbsp white vinegar 2 cups beef stock 1 tbsp worcestershire sauce 3½ tbsp all-purpose flour ½ cup sour cream opt: set aside additional for topping Instructions: Cover meat in salt and pepper.

item.title: Buffalo Chicken Dip
item.description: Ingredients: 2 cups shredded chicken 8 oz cream cheese (softened) ½ cup Frank’s Red Hot ½ cup ranch 1 block (roughly 6 oz) cheddar cheese (freshly grated) ½ cup blue cheese crumbles Instructions (chicken): Bring water to simmer. Place chicken in water, cover with lid, and leave for 45 minutes. Remove chicken, carve the meat, and shred using whatever works. Instructions (dip): Mix together cream cheese, hot sauce, and ranch. Mix in chicken.

item.title: Chow Mein
item.description: Ingredients (noodles): 400g egg noodles 2 chicken breasts (scored and chopped into bite-sized pieces) feel free to marinade 2 green onions (segmented) 1 carror (julienne) 3½ cups cabbage (about half of one head) 7 cloves of garlic (minced) 1 cup bean sprouts 2 Tbsp water Ingredients (sauce): 1½ Tbsp rice vinegar 2½ Tbsp soy sauce 2 Tbsp oyster sauce subst: hoisin sauce 3 tsp sesame oil 2 tsp cornstarch Instructions: Cook chicken to completion in wok, remove, and set to the side.
